TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Ili9341 extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The ILI9341 is a QVGA (Quarter VGA) driver integrated circuit that is used to control 240Ã—320 VGA LCD screens.

MemberSignature.Value: public Ili9341 (System.Device.Spi.SpiDevice spiDevice, int dataCommandPin, int resetPin, int backlightPin = -1, int spiBufferSize = 4096, System.Device.Gpio.GpioController? gpioController = default, bool shouldDispose = true);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Device.Spi.SpiDevice spiDevice, int32 dataCommandPin, int32 resetPin, int32 backlightPin, int32 spiBufferSize, class System.Device.Gpio.GpioController gpioController, bool shouldDispose) cil managed

Public Sub New (spiDevice As SpiDevice, dataCommandPin As Integer, resetPin As Integer, Optional backlightPin As Integer = -1, Optional spiBufferSize As Integer = 4096, Optional gpioController As GpioController = Nothing, Optional shouldDispose As Boolean = true)
new Iot.Device.Ili934x.Ili9341 : System.Device.Spi.SpiDevice * int * int * int * int * System.Device.Gpio.GpioController * bool -> Iot.Device.Ili934x.Ili9341
MemberSignature.Usage: new Iot.Device.Ili934x.Ili9341 (spiDevice, dataCommandPin, resetPin, backlightPin, spiBufferSize, gpioController, shouldDispose)

Docs.param: The SPI device used for communication. This Spi device will be displayed along with the ILI9341 device.
The id of the GPIO pin used to control the DC line (data/command). This pin must be provided.
The id of the GPIO pin used to control the /RESET line (RST). Can be -1 if not connected
The pin for turning the backlight on and off, or -1 if not connected.
The size of the SPI buffer. If data larger than the buffer is sent then it is split up into multiple transmissions. The default value is 4096.
The GPIO controller used for communication and controls the the and the If no Gpio controller is passed in then a default one will be created and disposed when ILI9341 device is disposed.
True to dispose the Gpio Controller when done
Docs.summary: Initializes new instance of ILI9342 device that will communicate using SPI bus.
